name: Lots of Lines
description:
A digital remake of the classic game "Do not step on the lines on the ground" for these troubling times where we cant play it outside. Walk by keeping the mouse pressed at the target location and releasing when happy with orientation and position of foot. Get as many points as possible and don't let your feet go too far Offscreen.
This was made as a quick project for the COVID-19 Quarantine Jam.
